page.title: 15Westmorland Rd West Brom
page.content: Westmorland Rd is a main road so you can always hear the buzz of traffic especially at night when you try to get to sleep. My neighbour on one side isn't very nice. When we try to watch television the man next door gets his electric lawnmower out.He mows his lawn every other night. When we're playing tennis and knock the ball over they don't give us our ball back. We have a factory on the other side of the street but it has been knocked down now. My mom said she was glad because it made her washing dirty! When all the kids are coming home from school is the noisiest part of the day. The quietest part of the day is about 7.30-8.30 because none of the parents will let their children play by a main road. Claire Johnson, 12
